entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Nipigon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:46 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.1°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Blizzard developing this afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the afternoon then flurries or blizzard. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
